name: Minecart Jumper
description:
You are a famous adventurer looking for ancient Aztec artifact in an old abandoned mine.

All of a sudden you realize that you are surrounded by skeletons of previous adventurers who didn't make it.

You jump into a mine cart and a crazy adventure begins.

Swipe to jump on a different rail path.

Hold while in tunnels.

How far can you make it ?
